name: CreationStationforKids
0:
”Alexa, start creation station”
”Alexa, open creation station”
”Alexa, make a story with creation station”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: creation station
des: Creation Station will prompt you for an animal, color, and sport. Given your feedback, a wacky story will be generated and read back to you. Change up your inputs to get a goofier story
